column5: I'm heading out at about 7am to Oro/Shanty Bay to do some fishing for whities and lakers.  I'm a newbie to deep water fishing, but I tangled with a whole bunch of herring the other day while perch fishing, and it got me interested in the lakers and whities.  Anyone wanna tag along or have any tips for me ?
Nice to hear the herring gave you some action.  I'm not suggesting you kept any, but isn't there still an all year closed season for Simcoe herring ?

yeah herring are still closed year round on simcoe and all of the fish were put back.  I was fishing in 30 fow and coudlnt get my bait to the bottom without hooking herring.  I moved about 50 yards or so, and it was the same deal.  Eventually, they moved through, but I ended up catching 15 or 20 of them.  But like I said, they were all released immediately.
Just out of curiosity, how big were they?
Are you looking to go tommorow ? friday march 2?
